name: HTTP
description: Send HTTP requests with custom method and JSON body. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

body.name: body
body.info: Enter a valid JSON string for the request body.

code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, DropdownInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
import requests
import json
import numpy as np

class CustomComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Custom HTTP Request"
    description = "Send HTTP requests with custom method and JSON body."
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    icon = "custom_components"
    name = "CustomHTTPRequest"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="url",
            display_name="URL",
            value="",
            info="Enter the URL for the HTTP request."
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="method",
            display_name="Method",
            options=["GET", "POST", "PATCH", "PUT"],
            value="POST",
            info="The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PATCH, PUT).",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="body",
            display_name="JSON Body",
            value='{"key": "value"}',
            info="Enter a valid JSON string for the request body."
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Response", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def reduce_dimensions(self,vector, target_dim=1024):
        if len(vector) == target_dim:
            return vector
        elif len(vector) > target_dim:
            return vector[:target_dim]
        else:
            return vector + [0] * (target_dim - len(vector))
        
    def build_output(self) -> Data:
        url = self.url
        method = self.method
        body = self.body

        try:
            # 解析 JSON body
            json_body = json.loads(body)
            
            # 發送請求
            response = requests.request(
                method=method,
                url=url,
                json=json_body,
                headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"}
            )
            
            # 檢查響應
            response.raise_for_status()
            
            # 嘗試將響應解析為 JSON
            #try:
            content = response.json()
            #except json.JSONDecodeError:
            #embedding = response.json()['embedding']
        
            #content = self.reduce_dimensions(vector=embedding)
            
            #python_obj = content
            
            #vector = python_obj['embedding'] if "embedding" in python_obj else ""
            # 準備輸出數據
            output_data =  str(json.dumps(content))
        except json.JSONDecodeError:
            output_data = {"error": "Invalid JSON body"}
        except requests.RequestException as e:
            output_data = {"error": str(e)}

        data = Data(value=output_data)
        self.status = data
        return data

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, DropdownInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
import requests
import json
import numpy as np

class CustomComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Custom HTTP Request"
    description = "Send HTTP requests with custom method and JSON body."
    documentation: str = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    icon = "custom_components"
    name = "CustomHTTPRequest"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="url",
            display_name="URL",
            value="",
            info="Enter the URL for the HTTP request."
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="method",
            display_name="Method",
            options=["GET", "POST", "PATCH", "PUT"],
            value="POST",
            info="The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PATCH, PUT).",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="body",
            display_name="JSON Body",
            value='{"key": "value"}',
            info="Enter a valid JSON string for the request body."
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Response", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def reduce_dimensions(self,vector, target_dim=1024):
        if len(vector) == target_dim:
            return vector
        elif len(vector) > target_dim:
            return vector[:target_dim]
        else:
            return vector + [0] * (target_dim - len(vector))
        
    def build_output(self) -> Data:
        url = self.url
        method = self.method
        body = self.body

        try:
            # 解析 JSON body
            json_body = json.loads(body)
            
            # 發送請求
            response = requests.request(
                method=method,
                url=url,
                json=json_body,
                headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"}
            )
            
            # 檢查響應
            response.raise_for_status()
            
            # 嘗試將響應解析為 JSON
            #try:
            content = response.json()
            #except json.JSONDecodeError:
            #embedding = response.json()['embedding']
        
            #content = self.reduce_dimensions(vector=embedding)
            
            #python_obj = content
            
            #vector = python_obj['embedding'] if "embedding" in python_obj else ""
            # 準備輸出數據
            output_data =  str(json.dumps(content))
        except json.JSONDecodeError:
            output_data = {"error": "Invalid JSON body"}
        except requests.RequestException as e:
            output_data = {"error": str(e)}

        data = Data(value=output_data)
        self.status = data
        return data
